entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: J.A. Douglas McCurdy Sydney Airport 2:00 PM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: NNW 24 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
